WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not a possibility at this point.
WorkItem.Description:
I believe this would be a better choice:
 
Data Source=.\SQLExpress;Integrated Security=true;AttachDBFileName=|DataDirectory|ClubDB.mdf;User Instance=True
 
Instead of hard-coding a path to the mdf that doesn't exist on anyone else's computer. It would also be a nice change for first-time users since the web would then run out of the box.

Comments.Message: Sorry... it can't be that way :). You HAVE to specify a path in the ClubStarterKit.Data's app.config and it is just nice to have that same connection string.
